Package peer

Class PeerImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • peer.PeerImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, Peer
    public class PeerImp
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements Peer
    Implementation of a peer in the network
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  PeerImp.DownloadThread
      A thread that manages a download
      static class  PeerImp.FileQueueThread
      Thread used to handle the download threads of a single file (or chunk) Its job is to add the download threads to the queue and wait for them all to finish, nad finally write the file to the disk
      static class  PeerImp.GlobalQueueThread
      A thread that manages a queue of threads When a thread is done this thread is alerted, to make way for the next one

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      PeerImp.GlobalQueueThread download_queue_thread
      Thread that will run all the time, managing a queue of download threads
      PeerImp.GlobalQueueThread file_queue_thread
      Thread that will run all the time, managing a queue of file threads
      static java.util.logging.Logger logger
      Logger class used to show messages to the user INFO level is disabled by default, used to debug WARNING and SEVERE are always on, they show errors
      protected ContentManager manager
      The Manager of this peer
      private PeerInfo own_info
      The PeerInfo of this peer
      java.rmi.registry.Registry registry
      The Registry of this peer
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Manager> saved_managers
      HashMap where Manager references are stored using their PeerInfo.toString();
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Peer> saved_peers
      HashMap where Peer references are stored using their PeerInfo.toString();
      private java.util.List<PeerInfo> saved_peers_info
      List of all the peers that the program has the Peers and Managers referenced

      • add_node_components

        public void add_node_components​(PeerInfo node_peer_info)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Locally: Fetch the Peer and Manager of another node Remotely: When called back remotely with this.own_info as a parameter, used for offering its own Peer and Manager to a node
        Parameters:
        node_peer_info - the PeerInfo of the offered Peer and Manager
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - when remote calls fail
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - when "peer" and "manager" are not in node_peer_info's registry

      • start

        public void start​(PeerInfo own_info,
                  java.rmi.registry.Registry reg)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Setup function for a node; Locate the files and bind the own Peer and Manager
        Parameters:
        own_info - the PeerInfo of the node we are building
        reg - the Registry of the node we are building
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the Scanner fails
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - if looking up a remote node fails

      • find_network_contents

        public java.util.List<Content> find_network_contents​(java.util.List<PeerInfo> visited_peers,
                                                     java.lang.String restriction)
                                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Lists all the files available in the network, called back recursively
        Specified by:
        find_network_contents in interface Peer
        Parameters:
        visited_peers - List of all the PeerInfo's visited by this request
        restriction - Restriction of the returned files, looks like description|tag|name:desired data
        Returns:
        List with all the contents with file_data = null;
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if remote calls fail

        Specified by:
        find_seeders in interface Peer
        Parameters:
        file - the file we are looking for
        visited_peers - List of all the PeerInfo's visited by this request
